Apr 23, 2019 Budi Tanrim

Evolving Product Experience Principles at Bukalapak


On my second month at Bukalapak, we started having a discussion about evolving our Design Principles. After a few months working and advocating for it. I had a chance to share it on Medium. On that post, I shared some of the key highlights that I think are worth sharing, a bit of the process, and how we managed to keep things on track by having a certain criteria for “good” principles.

Go ahead and give it a read. I hope you enjoy them.
